ThingDef.label: bionic clavicle module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial clavicle module. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. You can install it to clavicle module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic arm module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm module. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological arm in almost every way. You can install it to arm module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic humerus module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial humerus module. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. You can install it to humerus module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic radius module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial radius module. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. You can install it to radius module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic hand module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial hand module. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological hand in almost every way. You can install it to hand module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic finger module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial finger module. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological finger in almost every way. You can install it to finger module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic femur module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial femur module. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. You can install it to femur module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic tibia module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial tibia module. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. You can install it to tibia module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic foot module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial foot module. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological foot in almost every way. You can install it to foot module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic toe module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial toe module. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological toe in almost every way. You can install it to toe module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: ranged platform module
ThingDef.description: An advanced ranged platform module. With stabilizer and targeting system can give your pawn great accuracy and turn your pawn to specialized for ranged combat. You can install it to clavicle module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: melee platform module
ThingDef.description: An advanced melee platform module. With sensory motor and targeting system can give your pawn great melee damage and turn your pawn to specialized for melee combat. You can install it to clavicle module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: power arm module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial power arm module. With its biogel nerve-link, lattice-dust healing system, and high blunt damage than normal arm, it is better than a biological arm in almost every way. You can install it to arm module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: power claw module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial power claw module. With its biogel nerve-link, lattice-dust healing system, and has sharp claw attached to it, it is better than a biological hand in almost every way. You can install it to hand module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: adamantium coated bone module
ThingDef.description: A bone module that coated with adamantium alloy. Able to sustain almost all attack. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. You can install it to all bone module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.
